PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-15002010-11-29,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActMotor Vehicle Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Motor Vehicle Restraint Systems and Booster Seats Safety Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE RESTRAINT SYSTEMS AND BOOSTER SEATS SAFETY REGULATIONS, to extend the transition period to December 31, 2011, in order to allow the manufacturers to complete the testing, redesign and certification of their restraints to conform with the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0279 Publication Date: 2010-12-08
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Motor Vehicle Restraint Systems and Booster Seats Safety Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the MOTOR VEHICLE RESTRAINT SYSTEMS AND BOOSTER SEATS SAFETY REGULATIONS, to extend the transition period to December 31, 2011, in order to allow the manufacturers to complete the testing, redesign and certification of their restraints to conform with the Regulations.
